    • welcomeParty

      public static int welcomeParty(DEQ<Party> waiting, AscendinglyOrderedList<Name,String> parties, int waitingListSize, List<ECSection> sections) throws IOException
      Prompts user to create a new party which is added to the waiting queue
      Parameters:
      waiting - the waiting customers
      parties - the name of all present parties both waiting and being served
      waitingListSize - the number of customers waiting
      Returns:
      the new size of the waiting queue
      Throws:
      IOException

    • seatParty

      public static int seatParty(List<ECSection> sections, DEQ<Party> waiting, int waitingListSize)
      Attempts to seat parties in first come first serve order. If a party cannot be seated, this method will attempt to seat the next party in line until either a party is seated or no party could be seated.
      Parameters:
      sections - The sections within the restaurant
      waiting - The waiting customers
      waitingListSize - The number of customers waiting
      Returns:
      the size of the waiting queue which may or may not be decremented depending on if a party was seated or not.

    • removeParty

      public static void removeParty(List<ECSection> sections, DEQ<Party> waiting, AscendinglyOrderedList<Name,String> parties) throws IOException
      Prompts user to specify a party that wishes to leave the restaurant. Displays leaving party and newly free table is successful, otherwise displays failure message.
      Parameters:
      sections - the sections within the restaurant
      waiting - the waiting customers
      parties - the name of all present parties
      Throws:
      IOException

    • addTable

      public static void addTable(List<ECSection> sections) throws IOException
      Prompts the user for a new table to add to the restaurant.
      Parameters:
      sections - the sections within the restaurant
      Throws:
      IOException

    • removeTable

      public static void removeTable(List<ECSection> sections) throws IOException
      Prompts user for a table to remove from the restaurant and attempts to remove it. Displays information of table if successfully removed, otherwise display why it could not be removed.
      Parameters:
      sections - the sections within the restaurant
      Throws:
      IOException

    • displayAvailableTables

      public static void displayAvailableTables(List<ECSection> sections)
      Displays all available tables in the restaurant by section.
      Parameters:

    • displayWaiting

      public static void displayWaiting(DEQ<Party> waiting)
      Displays all parties waiting to be seated in FIFO order
      Parameters:
      waiting - all waiting customers

    • displayServing

      public static void displayServing(List<ECSection> sections)
      Displays all parties being served in the restaurant by section.
      Parameters:
